column10: Minutes of Delay by Cause (Late Flights)

column1: Note: Minutes of delay calculated for flights arriving 15 minutes or more after scheduled arrival time.

NOTE: The number of reporting carriers has varied as follows:
2003: 18
2004: 19
2005: 20
2006: 20
2007: 20
